subject: Recordings and Downloads (Video)
Football
Rumors
lead_paragraph: The Patriots responded to a rumor that they had taped the St. Louis Rams walk-through before Super Bowl XXXVI, and the N.F.L. said it had found no evidence that the taping had occurred.
snippet: The Patriots responded to a rumor that they had taped the St. Louis Rams walk-through before Super Bowl XXXVI, and the N.F.L. said it had found no evidence that the taping had occurred.
